creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
The CSS2 spec. limits the string representation of floating point numbers and
does not allow scientific notation.

Evaluation:

- This impacts numbers in the ranger 10-3 < n < 107
- Requires modification of doubleString methods in svggen package

What should be fixed? Unclear:

- Will request that the CSS group reconsiders its notation limitation
- ASV3 supports scientific notation
- Would be simpler (code wise) to support scientific notation when parsing numbers.

creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text: More report show this should be considered for 1.5 final fix.
This was fixed with the new handling of doubleString in the SVG Generator.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
